It’s an emotional moment but it’s time to celebrate this historic event. Joe Biden is the next president of the United States. Kamala Harris is the first woman first Asian American and only the second African-American to be on a winning Presidential ticket.

Joe Biden is on track to win this election and he will be the next President of the United States.   We have to be patient. We owe it to the American people to count EVERY vote. Every voice should be heard in this historic election.  No president is more powerful than our vote.

This election comes down to one question: Who is on your side?  After tonight the choice couldn’t be clearer.  President Trump isn't worried about us. He isn’t worried about COVID victims. He's worried about himself.   Joe Biden is on our side. He’s who we need. #Debates2020

President Trump​ knowingly and willingly lied to the American people about the threat COVID posed to our country. For months.  He panicked.  He didn’t have a plan then and he made clear tonight – more than six months into the pandemic – that he still has no plan. #Debates2020
